participant_1.background:
I try to have a good relationship with my family, but it can be difficult because I am often busy with work.
I joined a new gym near my home in New Mexico to continue my athletic pursuits.
i live with my boyfriend in an apartment.
i am 7 foot tall.
I sometimes spend too much time procrastinating on my homework.

participant_2.background:
My family has a hard time understanding my lifestyle choices.
I enjoy watching cooking videos but am not very good at cooking myself.
i am bisexual.
My life is filled with contradictions, and I'm working on accepting myself for who I am.
I don't care about my height because I am comfortable with who I am.

content.text: Hey there!
Hello!
What's up?
Just watching some cooking videos.  I'm trying to learn how to make a good lasagna.
Lasagna is one of my favorite dishes!  It's so delicious.
I know, right?  I'm trying to figure out how to make the ricotta filling from scratch.  I've heard that it's really good.
I've never made ricotta from scratch before.  I'll have to look into that.
You should!  It's not too hard, and it's a lot fresher than store-bought ricotta.
I'm sure it would be.  I'm always looking for new ways to cook.
Me too!  I love trying new recipes.
What else do you like to cook?
I like to cook all sorts of things.  I'm not very good at baking, but I love to cook savory dishes.
Me too!  I'm not much of a baker either.  I like to make pasta dishes, soups, and stews.
Those are all my favorite things to eat!
Me too!  I'm getting hungry just thinking about it.
Me too!  I think I'm going to have to make some lasagna for dinner tonight.
That sounds delicious!  I'll have to come over and have some.
Of course!  You're always welcome.
Thanks!  I'll bring some wine.
Sounds good!  I'll start making the lasagna.
Great!  I'll be there in a bit.
